metadata.title: X Post Analyzer - Analyze X Timeline Recommendation Potential
metadata.description: Calculate your post's recommendation score based on X's algorithm and get improvement suggestions

header.title: X Post Analyzer
header.subtitle: Analyze your post's potential to appear on the For You timeline based on X's official algorithm, and get scoring with improvement suggestions

customApiKey.label: Gemini API Key
customApiKey.warning: Using your own API key will consume your API quota and cost. The key is stored in memory only and will be cleared on page reload.
customApiKey.httpsRequired: HTTPS connection is required in production
customApiKey.helpText: Enter your Gemini API key (leave blank to use default key)

share.text:
I analyzed my post with X's algorithm and got {score} points ({grade} rank)!

How about your post?

https://x.kano.codes #XPostAnalyzer

error.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later
error.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your connection
error.customApiKeyRequiresHttps: Custom API key requires HTTPS connection
